description: PHMSA MAOP-based compliance rules for pipeline segments

maop_compliance.description: Maximum Allowable Operating Pressure compliance thresholds

thresholds.description: Normal operating condition - pressure below 90% of MAOP
Approaching operational limit - pressure at or above 90% of MAOP
Critical condition - pressure at or above 95% of MAOP
MAOP violation - pressure at or exceeds MAOP limit

maop_compliance.evaluation_note: Thresholds are evaluated from highest to lowest ratio. First matching condition determines status.
